# Government Tender Announcement 

## Title: Underground Water and Sewer Materials 

### English Title
* Underground Water and Sewer Materials (W6854-240335B) - PSIB

### French Title
* Pièces pour les conduites d’eau et d’égouts (W6854-240335B) - SAEA

## Key Details

* **Reference Number**: WS4534804840-Doc4575021175 
* **Solicitation Number**: WS4534804840
* **Publication Date**: 08 May 2024
* **Tender Closing Date**: 22 May 2024, 14:00 EDT
* **Expected Contract Start Date**: 28 June 2024
* **Expected Contract End Date**: 30 June 2025

## Amendment Information

* This solicitation cancels and supersedes previous solicitation Doc4534952720 dated 12 April 2024.
* All bids submitted after 22 May 2024, at 14:00 EDT, will result in the bid being declared non-responsive.

## Scope of Work

* The Offeror will supply and deliver underground water and sewer components, including ductile and cast iron, valves and hydrants, and municipal casting, listed in the most current Ontario edition of the Allpriser Blue Book for Watermain and Sewer Products.
* The components will be delivered on an as-and-when-requested basis to the Canadian Forces Base (CFB) Borden.

## Standalone Offer

* The contract period will be one year, with an option to extend for an additional year.

## Contact Information

* **Contact Name**: Cheng, Sabrina (SPAC/PSPC)
* **Contact Email**: [sabrina.cheng@tpsgc-pwgsc.gc.ca](mailto:sabrina.cheng@tpsgc-pwgsc.gc.ca)
* **Notice URL**: <https://discovery.ariba.com/rfx/19639044?extsite=MTk2MzkwNDRfQU4wMTQ4NDA1MDk5Mg==></https://discovery.ariba.com/rfx/19639044?extsite=MTk2MzkwNDRfQU4wMTQ4NDA1MDk5Mg==>

## Category Information

* **Procurement Category**: Goods and Services (G&D)
* **Trade Agreements**: Canadian Free Trade Agreement (CFTA)
